page.title: 18TRANSPORT NORTH HYKEHAM
page.content: There are three types of transport in our 'D' block.There are trains,taxis and buses,as well as private cars and cycles. The types of trains that come through are diesels,tankers and high speed trains(mainly on Sunday,when the main line is closed for track works). The main roads e.g. the A46 and the A15 are very busy.There are some train tracks which have been taken up. There is a British Rail station in North Hykeham where local diesel trains stop on the route from Nottingham to Lincoln.The nearest large station is Lincoln.There are National Road Car service buses and Lincoln Corporation.Birds Coaches are a long established local firm who undertake private hire and take children to school from around.
